post:
Greetings,

We are from Pump Cloud, a brand of Pump Inc.

Today we are bringing our2017 Winter Sale promotion, 20% off all products!

All KVM, All DDR4, Pure SSD

Use coupon code **JANFEB2017** to get 20% off, coupon valid until 02/12.

Our Los Angeles product line (with China Telecom CN2) has been restocked!

Windows OS is available on Plan 2 or higher plans.

IPv6 upon request (except WAW), rDNS upon request.

Payments: PayPal , Alipay, Credit Card (Visa, MC, AMEX, Discover, Unionpay, JCB, Diners Club), Bitcoin

Full support is available in French too.

Looking glass: [LA](http://lg-lax.pumpcloud.net) [BHS](http://lg-bhs.pumpcloud.net) [SBG](http://lg-sbg.pumpcloud.net) [WAW](http://lg-waw.pumpcloud.net)
